ComicInfo.Summary: On His Majesty's Secret Agency: Nigel Cord and Kristal Veil get captured by Professor Daedalus's minions. Lady Pippa and Douglas Chance search London pubs for Mike 70. Haiku tries to retire.
ComicInfo.Title: On His Majesty's Secret Agency
